nodes.text: No Place Like Home was a roleplaying-game adventure in year two of the Living Force campaign.

The heroes travel to Oluna Biqua for a luxury holiday. However, the Metatheran Cartel have accidentally released the Force-infused gas Trinex-M there, which has contaminated the entire population and given them pseudo-Force powers. The heroes must find a sample of the gas, so that a cure can be manufactured before it is too late.
